enWisdom: Forbearance is the cornerstone of [good] leadership
Forgiveness is the ornament of power
Equity is the ornament of [power and] authority

Wisdom: اضْرِبْ خَادِمَكَ إِذَا عَصَى اللَّهَ وَاعْفُ عَنْهُ إِذَا عَصَاكَ
enWisdom: Beat your servant when he disobeys Allah but forgive him when he disobeys you

Wisdom: تَجَاوَزْ مَعَ الْقُدْرَةِ وَأَحْسِنْ مَعَ الدَّوْلَةِ تَكْمُلْ لَكَ السِّيَادَةُ
enWisdom: Overlook despite having power [to punish] and do good while possessing authority, [for by this] your mastery will become complete

Wisdom: ذُو الشَّرَفِ لَا تُبْطِرُهُ مَنْزِلَةٌ نَالَهَا وَإِنْ عَظُمَتْ كَالْجَبَلِ الَّذِي لَا تُزَعْزِعُهُ الرِّيَاحُ وَالدَّنِيُّ تُبْطِرُهُ أَدْنَى مَنْزِلَةٍ [نزلة] كَالْكَلَإِ الَّذِي يُحَرِّكُهُ مَرُّ النَّسِيمِ
enWisdom: The honourable person is not made reckless by the status he attains, even if it becomes as great as a mountain that is not shaken by strongest winds; and the lowly is made careless by the most inferior position, just as the grass that is moved by the passing breeze

Wisdom: ذَاكَ يَنْفَعُ سِلْمُهُ وَلَا يُخَافُ ظُلْمُهُ إِذَا قَالَ فَعَلَ وَإِذَا وُلِّيَ عَدَلَ
enWisdom: He (‘a) praised a man saying: This is one whose peacefulness benefits and injustice is not feared from himWhen he says, he does and when he put in charge, he is just
The alms-tax of power is even-handedness
Forgiveness is the alms-tax of power
Victory is the intercessor of the guilty
Covetousness debases the commander
The instrument of leadership is [patience and] large-heartedness

Wisdom: الْعَفْوُ مَعَ الْقُدْرَةِ جُنَّةٌ مِنْ عَذَابِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: Forgiveness despite [having the] power [to exact revenge] is a shield from the punishment of Allah, the Glorified
The best king is the one who has the most continent soul
The authority of a vile person manifests his evil traits and flaws
The authority of a noble-minded person manifests his positive attributes
The cornerstone of politics is employing leniency
The embellishment of leadership is bestowing favours

Wisdom: عِنْدَ كَمَالِ الْقُدْرَةِ تَظْهَرُ فَضِيلَةُ الْعَفْوِ
enWisdom: It is when one possesses complete authority that the virtue of forgiveness becomes manifest

Wisdom: مَنْ تَجَبَّرَ عَلَى مَنْ دُونَهُ كُسِرَ
enWisdom: One who is haughty with the one who is below him gets broken [and pulled down from his position]

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَطَالَ عَلَى النَّاسِ بِقُدْرَتِهِ سُلِبَ الْقُدْرَةَ
enWisdom: Whoever is haughty with people because of his authority, his authority will get stripped away
